data.name: The Wizards - Trials of Meliora
data.description:
Become a powerful wizard and test your mettle as a defender of the Realm of Meliora! Based on the award-winning spellcaster The Wizards, this game is a completely new magical adventure set in the same fantasy world, developed from the ground for Oculus Go and Gear VR. 

Now with two more levels, new enemies and game mechanics!

Features:
• Detailed graphics powered by Unreal Engine 4
• Intuitive gesture-based system of spellcasting
• Four elemental spells with unique conjuring gestures
• Five original fantasy levels
• Leveling and spell upgrading system for the ultimate wizardry 
• Online leaderboard to challenge fellow wizards

IMPORTANT: The game does not support some phones (i.e. Galaxy S6 series). Please check compatible devices list before buying the game.

changelog.change_log:
General

Vastly improved fireball throwing
Fixed projectiles disappearing after a few seconds during pause
Increased highlight intensity of targeted crystals 

Spells:

Increased the angle tolerance while throwing a fireball
Fixed fireballs that would float around a non-existing crystal

• General:

○ Two new levels
○ Main Menu redesign
○ Added “How To Play” section to Pause Menu
○ New feature on existing levels: automatic cannons, charged with lightning
○ Updated old and added new narrator voiceovers

• Spells:

○ Fireball:
- Audio tweaks
- Visual tweaks

• Levels:

○ New level: Pocket Dimension
- A place out of time, suspended beyond the natural laws of physics 
- Enemies teleport between paths

○ New Level: Shrike’s Lookout
- A scenic and dangerous place, bearing marks of an ancient magical calamity
- Features Phantoms - new type of enemy

○ Major balance changes, shortened Trials of Fate playthrough time
○ Added cannon on Dungeon and Desert levels
○ Added Phantoms on Desert level
